card-example: A simple example demonstrating the Card component with header, content, and footer sections.
card-link-example: Demonstration of an interactive, clickable card component with link functionality.
card-showcase: Comprehensive showcase of Card component variants including default, outlined, elevated, and interactive styles with various configurations.
kitchen-sink-core: Complete showcase of fundamental UI components including buttons, badges, headings, text, icons, and interactive elements. Demonstrates component variations, states, and styling options for comprehensive design system exploration.
kitchen-sink-feedback: User feedback and notification component collection including alerts, progress indicators, loading states, toast notifications, and status communication elements. Essential for user experience and interaction feedback patterns.
kitchen-sink-forms: Complete showcase of all form components including text inputs, selections, advanced fields, and complete form containers. Demonstrates single-page forms, multi-step wizards, and quiz forms with validation and interactive features.
kitchen-sink-general: Ultimate component showcase featuring the complete library of available UI elements, layout patterns, and interactive components. Comprehensive reference for understanding the full capabilities and design system scope.
kitchen-sink-header-navbar: A comprehensive example of a header and navbar with various layout variants, menu styles, and animations. Contains Navbar examples in the pages.
kitchen-sink-layout: Comprehensive layout component library featuring grids, flexbox containers, sections, spacing utilities, and responsive layout patterns. Showcases structural components for building complex page architectures and content organization.
kitchen-sink-media: Media component library featuring images, videos, galleries, lightboxes, document viewers, and multimedia presentation elements. Showcases visual content integration patterns and media-rich layout options.
kitchen-sink-navbar: Complete navigation component showcase featuring different navbar styles, menu structures, responsive behaviors, and branding options. Demonstrates horizontal navigation patterns for website headers and top-level navigation.
kitchen-sink-sidebar: Dashboard-style layout with comprehensive sidebar navigation and core dashboard components. Features vertical navigation patterns, user interfaces, and application-style layouts for admin panels and web applications.
kitchen-sink-website-content: Extensive content component collection including markdown blocks, testimonials, team members, feature items, process steps, and rich content elements. Ideal for understanding content presentation patterns and editorial layouts.
kitchen-sink-website-services: Service and form component library featuring contact forms, newsletter signups, waitlist components, and interactive service elements. Showcases user engagement patterns and data collection interfaces for websites.
kitchen-sink-website-utils: Utility component collection including SEO meta tags, language selectors, share buttons, date displays, lazy loading, and helper components. Features supportive elements that enhance functionality and user experience.
